mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectEmTranMms Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MMS_SEQ , FILE_CNT , BUILD_YN , MMS_BODY , MMS_SUBJECT , FILE_TYPE1 , FILE_TYPE2 , FILE_TYPE3 , FILE_TYPE4 , FILE_TYPE5 , FILE_NAME1 , FILE_NAME2 , FILE_NAME3 , FILE_NAME4 , FILE_NAME5 , SERVICE_DEP1 , SERVICE_DEP2 , SERVICE_DEP3 , SERVICE_DEP4 , SERVICE_DEP5 , SKN_FILE_NAME FROM EM_TRAN_MMS WHERE 1 = 1 AND MMS_SEQ = #{mmsSeq,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteEmTranMms Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM EM_TRAN_MMS WHERE 1 = 1 AND MMS_SEQ = #{mmsSeq,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
